column6: Deep in the unknown territories of The Fault, the Imperial Guard and their reluctant allies the Starjammers fight for their lives-and glimpse the true cosmic horror growing in the heart of this deadly new territory!  Can they get out alive with a warning for the rest of the Marvel Universe? This sounds like a job for...Gladiator! Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | writer:Dan Abnett | writer:Andy Lanning | penciller:Brian Haberlin | penciller:Kev Walker
